title: Haggard Wulf - Live on the Morgantown Sound (2012)
description:
Haggard Wulf are a 2-piece band from Morgantown, WV, who bring together
a mixture of blues, rockabilly and punk rock. Their sound and style is
diverse, bringing a very full sound to the table. They have a very strong DIY
ethic, much like the punk bands of the late 70s and early 80s.

This 14 track album was recorded live, direct from the master soundboard at the Gluck Theater for The Morgantown Sound on 91.7 WWVU FM on Oct. 8, 2012.

Tracklist:

1. Intro (1:11)
2. The Floorboards (2:31)
3. Death Parade (3:28)
4. Ride Into The Night (3:15)
5. Never Bet The Devil Your Head (5:02)
6. The Tall Man (3:55)
7. Children Of The Grave (3:10)
8. Bath Salt Blues (3:37)
9. Night Of The Vampire (3:40)
10. A Reason (4:05)
11. The Shadow Knows (3:27)
12. Jawbone (2:21)
13. Daddy Longlegs (2:29)
14. Outro (0:38)
